data.name: Pilot
data.rules:
Speedrun category for the full run of the Star Fetchers Pilot (Episode 0), macros are **NOT allowed in Mash%**, runs using a macro to spam E goes under Macro%.
Listed time should be **In-Game Time** shown at the end of the run during the credits sequence. Video must show both the **Star Fetchers Pilot main menu screen** and the **beginning of the end credits with the IGT visible.**

Simplified List of Rules

1. Provide Audio and Video
2. No Splicing Runs
3. No Macros (unless in Macro% and only to spam E)
4. No TAS Tools
5. No manipulation of text or game modding
6. Run must be completed in a single continuous segment

Full list of rules can be found in this document here: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/19TH9sEv8lmr8vor-0yNzVDuysxLMSXeBWCuPWPpNkc8/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19TH9sEv8lmr8vor-0yNzVDuysxLMSXeBWCuPWPpNkc8/edit?usp=sharing)
